item.title: Simon's Git(Hub) Reference
item.description: Create a new repo from existing files Assuming youâ€™ve already set up your ssh stuff git init git add . git commit -m "first commit" git remote add origin git@github.com:simonrolph/repo.git git push -u origin master Creating and pushing to a gh-pages branch git branch gh-pages git push -u origin gh-pages Go to https://github.com/username/repo/settings/ and change gh-pages to master branch Force pull git fetch --all Then, you have two options:
